Room.Name: Bendine Aquarium Main Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Main Hallway running through the Bendine Aquarium.
Room.LongDescription: The hallway turns to the southeast, heading towards the exit into the Bendine Marina, where the Whale Tank and the Salt Water Exhibit are located. To the north is the Shark Tank, where a number of exotic species of shark are kept for observation. It should be noted, though, that the giant megalodon sharks are said to have swallowed people whole.
